description: Name of the workgroup or fleet segment associated with the user in this mapping.
Unique user login identifier used to authenticate and reference the user in the system.
User ID or system process that created this record.
Date and time when the record was initially created.
User ID or system process that last modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent update to this record.
Flag indicating whether the user’s access in this workgroup is read-only (Y) or editable (N); likely a permissions setting for this mapping; confirm with SME.
User’s full display name (e.g., first and last name) for readability in the application.
